TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class DataSourceControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.ComponentModel.IListSource, System.Web.UI.IDataSource
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataSourceControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.IListSource, class System.Web.UI.IDataSource
Public MustInherit Class DataSourceControl Inherits Control Implements IDataSource, IListSource
public ref class DataSourceControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::ComponentModel::IListSource, System::Web::UI::IDataSource

summary.span: 作為控制項的基底類別，這些控制項代表與資料繫結控制項的資料來源。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that represent data sources to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援控制項的資料繫結架構，可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料一致的方式。ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 資料繫結控制項，以及協助繫結稱為資料來源控制項的類別會參照 web 伺服器控制項的繫結至資料。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 資料來源控制項可以表示任何資料來源： 關聯式資料庫、 檔案、 資料流、 商務物件等等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式中的資料來源控制項呈現資料。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 您可以使用所提供的資料來源控制項使用 ASP.NET，包括， ，和，才能執行大部分的網頁開發工作。You use the data source controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks. 使用基底類別，當您想要實作您自己的自訂資料來源控制項。You use the base class when you want to implement your own custom data source control. 雖然任何類別可實作介面是資料來源控制項，大部分的 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項擴充抽象類別，可提供的基底實作介面。While any class that implements the interface is a data source control, most ASP.NET data source controls extend the abstract class, which provides a base implementation of the interface. 類別也提供的實作介面，可讓您以程式設計的方式指派至資料來源控制項`DataSource`資料繫結控制項和傳回資料做為基本的清單控制項的屬性。The class also provides an implementation of the interface, which enables you to programmatically assign the data source control to the `DataSource` property of a data-bound control and return data to the control as a basic list. 任何衍生自的 ASP.NET 控制項類別可以繫結至資料來源控制項。Any ASP.NET control that derives from the class can bind to a data source control. 當繫結至資料來源控制項，資料繫結會自動在執行階段執行。When a is bound to a data source control, data binding is performed automatically at run time. 您也可以使用公開 （expose） 的 ASP.NET 控制項使用資料來源控制項`DataSource`或`DataSourceID`屬性和支援基本資料繫結，但不是衍生自。You can also use data source controls with ASP.NET controls that expose a `DataSource` or `DataSourceID` property and support basic data binding, but are not derived from . 使用這些資料繫結控制項時，您必須明確呼叫`DataBind`方法。When using these data-bound controls, you must explicitly call the `DataBind` method. 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). 您可以將資料來源控制項的組合視為物件和其相關聯的資料清單，稱為資料來源檢視。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated lists of data, called data source views. 每個清單的資料由物件。Each list of data is represented by a object. 因為基礎資料存放區包含一或多個清單的資料，永遠都與一個或多名為物件。Because the underlying data storage contains one or more lists of data, a is always associated with one or more named objects. 介面定義的所有資料來源控制項都用來與資料來源檢視互動的方法：方法用來列舉目前資料來源控制項，與相關聯的資料來源檢視和依名稱，方法用來擷取特定資料來源檢視執行個體。The interface defines the methods that all data source controls use to interact with data source views: the method is used to enumerate the data source views currently associated with the data source control, and the method is used to retrieve a specific data source view instance by name. 當兩個不同介面的呼叫端用來存取資料，您也可以將資料來源控制項。You can also think of the data source control as two distinct interfaces that callers use to access data. 類別是網頁開發人員直接互動開發 Web Forms 頁面時的介面和類別是資料繫結控制項和資料繫結控制項作者互動的介面。The class is the interface that page developers interact with directly when developing a Web Forms page, and the class is the interface that data-bound controls and data-bound control authors interact with. 因為物件只能在執行階段可供使用、 保存的資料來源控制項的任何狀態或資料來源檢視必須直接由資料來源控制項。Because the object is available only at run time, any state persisted for the data source control or data source view must be exposed directly by the data source control. 沒有任何視覺化呈現 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項。實作控制項，讓您以宣告方式，建立，並選擇性地允許它們參與狀態管理。There is no visual rendering of ASP.NET data source controls; they are implemented as controls so you can create them declaratively, and to optionally allow them to participate in state management. 如此一來，資料來源控制項不支援視覺化功能例如或。As a result, data source controls do not support visual features such as or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別類別。The following code example demonstrates how a class can extend the class. `CsvDataSource`控制項代表儲存在.csv 檔案中的逗號分隔的檔案資料。The `CsvDataSource` control represents comma-separated file data stored in a .csv file. `CsvDataSource`類別會提供自己的實作， ，和其他方法，因為基底類別實作會無法運作。The `CsvDataSource` class provides its own implementations of the , , and other methods, because the base class implementations are not functional. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`CsvDataSource`Web 表單中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CsvDataSource` control in a Web form. [!code-aspx-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform/CS/webform6cs.aspx#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform/VB/webform6vb.aspx#50)]

summary.span: 取得與資料來源控制項關聯的具名資料來源檢視。

span.span: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.

returns.span: 傳回與 關聯的具名 。

span.span: Returns the named associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以透過檢視與資料來源控制項藉由呼叫目前相關聯集列舉方法。You can enumerate through the set of views currently associated with the data source control by calling the method. 資料來源控制項類別可支援其基礎資料的一個或多個檢視。Data source control classes can support one or more views on their underlying data. 執行個體，代表這些檢視類別。These views are represented by instances of the class. 資料來源檢視定義資料來源控制項的功能、 從基礎資料存放區擷取資料所需的所有工作和執行作業，例如排序、 插入、 刪除和更新。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source control, does all the work necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data store, and performs operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating. > [!NOTE] > 類別的預設實作會傳回`null`。The class's default implementation returns `null`. 如果您擴充類別，覆寫方法以傳回指定物件。If you extend the class, override the method to return the specified object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充的資料來源控制項類別類別會實作方法，傳回強型別執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control class that extends the class implements the method, returning a strongly typed instance of the class. 資料來源控制項只支援一個檢視，因為它會忽略名稱，並傳回名為使用預設的檢視名稱的檢視。Because the data source control supports only one view, it ignores the name and returns a view named with the default view name. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得名稱集合，表示與 控制項關聯的 物件清單。

span.span: Gets a collection of names, representing the list of objects associated with the control.

returns.span: ，包含與 關聯的 物件名稱。

span.span: An that contains the names of the objects associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱集合是允許的一組值可以傳遞至方法。The collection of names is the allowable set of values that can be passed to the method. 類別，用於類別的實作，會檢查兩個方法和呼叫以判斷是否在資料來源控制項都與一個或更多的資料來源檢視。The class, which is used for the class's implementation, checks the method for both the and calls to determine whether the data source control is associated with one or more data source views. 如果傳回`null`，這是預設實作的方法，傳回`false`和傳回`null`。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the method, returns `false` and returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 類別的預設實作會傳回`null`。The class's default implementation returns `null`. 如果您擴充類別，覆寫方法以傳回檢視名稱的集合。If you extend the class, override the method to return a collection of view names. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充的類別類別可以覆寫預設實作，它會傳回`null`，以提供的檢視名稱集合。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the default implementation, which returns `null`, to provide a collection of view names. `CsvDataSource`類別僅支援一個檢視，因此，會傳回的預設檢視表名稱使用的項目集合。The `CsvDataSource` class only supports one view; therefore, a collection of one element with the default view name is returned. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RaiseDataSourceChangedEvent (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaiseDataSourceChangedEvent(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaiseDataSourceChangedEvent (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void RaiseDataSourceChangedEvent(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會告知資料繫結控制項的基礎資料來源或快取在記憶體中的資料已經變更，並應該重新繫結控制項，並執行任何所需的其他工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, and that the control should rebind and perform any necessary additional work. 一般而言，屬性的資料來源控制項或參數值已變更時呼叫方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source control or a parameter value has changed. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法時的資料來源或其基礎資料已變更，就可能會影響任何繫結控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method when a data source or its underlying data has changed in a way that might affect any bound controls. 在此範例中，以檔案為基礎的資料來源控制項延伸類別所引發藉由呼叫事件隨時`FileName`屬性變更。In this example, a file-based data source control that extends the class raises the event by calling any time the `FileName` property is changed. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: if the is associated with one or more objects; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來判斷目前的物件是否可以當做資料的一或多個清單的來源。This property is used to determine whether the current object can be used as a source of one or more lists of data. 資料來源控制項封裝清單的資料做為物件; 因此，當一或多個相關聯物件，控制項代表清單的來源物件和屬性會傳回`true`。Data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects; therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the property returns `true`. 這個屬性會呼叫靜態方法，以判斷是否在目前的資料來源控制項可用來當做資料來源。This property calls the static method to determine whether the current data source control can be used as a source of data. 類別會決定是否方法會傳回有效的檢視名稱的集合。The class determines whether the method returns a valid collection of view names. 如果是這樣，這個屬性會傳回`true`。If it does, this property returns `true`. 如果傳回`null`，這是預設實作類別，該方法會傳回`false`。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the class, the method returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: System.Collections.IList IListSource.GetList ();
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IList System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList() cil managed
Function GetList () As IList Implements IListSource.GetList
virtual System::Collections::IList ^ System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList() = System::ComponentModel::IListSource::GetList;

summary.span: 取得可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項清單。

span.span: Gets a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

returns.span: 可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項之 。

span.span: An of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來擷取一組可用來當做資料來源的物件。This method is used to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources of data. 資料來源控制項封裝清單的資料做為物件; 因此，當一或多個相關聯物件控制項代表清單的來源物件，而且方法會傳回的集合一個項目、本身。Data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects; therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the method returns an collection of one element, the itself. 這個方法會呼叫靜態方法來擷取物件的集合，可用來當做資料來源。This method calls the static method to retrieve an collection of objects that can be used as sources of data. 類別會決定是否傳回有效的檢視名稱的集合。The class determines whether returns a valid collection of view names. 若是如此，類別會傳回的一個項目集合控制項。If it does, the class returns an collection of one element, the control. 如果傳回`null`，這是預設實作類別類別也會傳回`null`。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the class, the class also returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `viewName`只支援一個檢視，這類的資料來源控制項上呼叫這個方法時，會忽略參數和控制項。The `viewName` parameter is ignored when this method is called on data source controls that support only one view, such as the and controls. > [!NOTE] > 類別的預設實作會呼叫此介面方法，會傳回`null`。The class's default implementation, which is called by this interface method, returns `null`. 如果您擴充類別，覆寫方法以傳回指定物件。If you extend the class, override the method to return the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別的預設實作會呼叫此介面方法，會傳回`null`，表示該只有一個檢視支援。The class's default implementation, which is called by this interface method, returns `null`, which indicates that only one view is supported. 如果您擴充類別，覆寫方法以傳回檢視名稱的集合。If you extend the class, override the method to return a collection of view names. 名稱可以傳遞至方法以傳回物件。A name can be passed to the method to return a object.

Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為控制項有沒有視覺化呈現，屬性一律會傳回`false`。Because the control has no visual rendering, the property always returns `false`.
